## ExpectInterface.stringMatching() method

Matches strings that contain the provided substring.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
stringMatching(substring: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  substring | string | a string to look for in the matched values. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
